Blog.post: SIGH!!!!!!!!!!!! anyway today its a very sad day....i think i ll definetly fail my history....bcos....i got like plenty of reasons... anyway today i had my history and a very SAD!!! paper which is PJK....i cant believe it trials got PJK!!!SAD SKOOL!!!!today for history i slept for 2 hours i didnt even touch for the 1st two hours of the paper...not even my name was on the paper...then my teacher woke me up and ask me to start doin...so i did...eventually 1 of the question very kacang putih so i did and did and did and did..until my paper got writing...then after that i ask my fren to help me out in the Islam part...so he did...after copying half way times was up...i was like "OH MAN WHY NOW"so ok la then pass up the paper lor...then after recess i got PJK i finish it in bout 10 mins i think i was quite quick so i told teacher whether i could pass up the paper a not and go out she didnt let me she say sit down turn in front and sleep....sigh...wanted to go toilet wan...wanted to do small business but then wat to do...got to TAHAN!!!!!susah nak tahan...anyway now gtg addey la write too much addey...if write too much than not nice lor....bye...

hey....anyway today got perdagangan and sains today.....so boring la everyday exam exam only...nothin else to do liao....anyway today exam perdagangan quite asy lor...1st time since form 4 i write i soalan one whole page very happy...but dun noe whether correct a not i wrote a lot of rubbish inside hehe...anyway for sains today very san fu man....so hard wan to copy oso cannot....anyway sains tembak a lot anyway gtg now ll write one tomolo....

this week is gonna be tough....its EXAM WEEK!!!!!!!!!!NO!!!!anyway today i had my perdangangan and bm.....i think i did quite badly for my BM i didnt really pay attetention to wat the question wans me to do....anyway i haven been posting much..so today this post ll be very long...on saturday went to my frens church(Wai Leong)he was forcing me to go for a concert...anyway i am glad he force me bcos the concert was SUPERB!!!! the drummer was so geng...not only that there got so many leng lui...got a lot of ppl were there....anyway when i went there there got their own starbucks shop....i am so jealous...there i met a lot of my frens fren...there are such a nice ppl....before that there was a wedding so i attended it it was my yf teacher....the wife so leng lui.....haha...anyway on sunday pula one of my tai ko goin of to Texas US he ll be studying there....so we prepared to hav a final futsal game wit him....anyway after that came home and start my studies for today exams....eventhough i study nothing went in....anyway now i am in the middle of studying....so gtg now bye....
